name: string-match
description: Test if a string at a specified path matches a regex pattern

input.description: Any JSON object containing a string value at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the string field (e.g., 'user.email')

output.description: true if string matches pattern, false if doesn't match or path doesn't exist or value is not a string

examples.description: Test if email field matches email pattern
Test if field contains only digits
